message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I've done some research and I'm not sure it's worth the full $110 to me.
I understand your concerns, Bob, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $100. It's a great value, and I think you'll really enjoy it.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product, but I'd need to see a bit more flexibility from you. Can you meet me at $95?
I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make another adjustment. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $98. It's a fair price, and I think you'll really enjoy it.

I appreciate your willingness to make another adjustment, but I'm still not convinced it's worth $98 to me. I'm willing to pay $92 for the product, and I think that's a fair price considering the value I'll get from it. Can you meet me at $92?
I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make another adjustment. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $96. It's a great value, and I think you'll really enjoy it.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still not convinced it's worth $96 to me. I'm willing to pay $90 for the product, and I think that's a fair price considering the value I'll get from it. Can you meet me at $90?
I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $94. It's a great value, and I think you'll really enjoy it.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more adjustment, Alice, but I'm still not willing to pay $94. I'm willing to pay $90 for the product, and I think that's a fair price considering the value I'll get from it. If you're not willing to meet me at $90, I'll have to consider buying from John for $100, and I'm not sure I want to do that. Can you really meet me at $90?
